title: Mine action intervention in the Srebrenica region 2016-2017
description: 1. Support ICMP and MPI activities in finding remaining missing persons from Srebrenica through mine clearance of ICMP and MPI locations of interest. 2. Create conditions for economic activities in Srebrenica region that will facilitate sustainable return through releasing of mine contaminated land and other mine action interventions. It will enable safe environment for population, facilitating reconstruction and productive use of agricultural land and forestry.
